layout.name: hormove

layout.name: vermove

layout.tooltip: If checked, the Necky will move from top to bottom

layout.name: period

layout.name: amplitude
layout.title: Amplitude
layout.tooltip: Only if it moves periodically. Determines the total lenght of movement.

layout.name: w
layout.title: Frequency
layout.tooltip: Only if it moves periodically. Determines the amount of movement cycles per second
